verses.roman:
tadaiva kuśalaṁ no 'bhūt
sa-nāthās te kṛtā vayam
jñatīn naḥ smaratā kṛṣṇa
bhrātā me preṣitas tvayā

synonyms: tadā—at that time; eva—only; kuśalam—well-being; naḥ—our; abhūt—arose; sa—with; nāthāḥ—a protector; te—by You; kṛtāḥ—made; vayam—we; jñātīn—Your relatives; naḥ—us; smaratā—who remembered; kṛṣṇa—O Kṛṣṇa; bhrātā—brother (Akrūra); me—my; preṣitaḥ—sent; tvayā—by You.
translation: [Queen Kuntī said:] My dear Kṛṣṇa, our welfare was assured only when You remembered us, Your relatives, and gave us Your protection by sending my brother to visit us.
